english.segment1: Sometimes, it gets hard upon this beaten road. Sometimes, I am tempted just to walk alone
english.segment2: But I hear Your words out of my mouth. Wanting, expecting that. The seeds that I've sown this time. I'll reap in a short while
english.segment3: I'll run and not grow weak. Walk and will not faint. Climb the highest mountain to dive off. And I'll fly high on. I'll fly high on broken wings
english.segment4: All I desire is everything that You are. Strength is renewed as I wait on You, God.
